summary: Experienced Software Engineer skilled in software and web development with passion for graphics and low-level programming. I am currently using my skills in the field of computer graphics while working on well-maintained and goal-oriented project in assistance of customer satisfaction research project in Rijksuniversiteit Groningen. As an active team player, with good communication skills and a solid background imperative programming in various imperative languages (C, C++, Python, JavaScript, Java, others), I have the ability to take initiative when it comes to finding new ways to complete tasks and solve complex problems.

projects.title: Virtual career center for teachers/staff
projects.description: The website is provides information and presentation of project BG051PO001-3.1.09 "Development of the system for qualification and career development of the academic staff at Sofia University "St. Kliment Ohridski". The project is Wordpress platform structured to fit the internal needs and to provide annotations and information about all courses taught in this project, as the information website tends to give knowledge of the project existence among all the staff of Sofia University about this free university-internal education. Responsibility about this projects is front-end design slicing and module combining with some ideas about presentation of information to give unique look and feel of the website.

projects.title: VSL Associates
projects.description:
Village Savings and Loan model is a self-managed and self-capitalised microfinance methodology. The central unit of this model are the regular local meetings which collects information about the clients. VSLA project is central system allowing the collected hybrid data to be organized and suitable reports to be returned. Unique algorithms implemented in the system allow administrator to separate trustful clients and risk clients. System allow real time monitoring of the data and visualizing it on a map, allowing user to identify problem locations.
As a part of the team I was responsible for implementing new features (map to visualize areas based on specific criteria, algorithms for identifying trustful and risk clients, etc) introduced in the latest version.

projects.title: VSL Associates Offline Application
projects.description: As VSLA project usually operates on local level with no internet connection, this web application is created to allow VSLA users to be able to register information without using internet. Based on the latest technologies for application cache and client-side data encryption, the project allows storage of sensitive data offline without risks of stealing it or impersonate another user on the same device. Application is accessible through the browser, so user experience is the same with and without internet connection. When user have access to internet, manually started synchronization can be done, providing secure data transfer to the server, including security and integrity of recorded  dates and times.

projects.title: Risk Management System
projects.description:
This project developed to help the teams manage the risks. The system allow a company to register all their employees and define strategic and operation objectives. Then risks can be identified and registered through the system, alongside with its initial assessment. The system can suggest whether the risks is really important (based on assessment) and allow registration of actions taken for that risks. A one-time or periodic controls can be registered to remind the stakeholders to re-asses the risk.
System is developed on NodeJS platform. For framework is used express and sequelize. The system uses temporal database programming and integrates with external email service to provide accurate notifications. Reports and exporting reports as PDF are also included.

projects.title: СУ - КСК2014
projects.description:
КСК2014 is application campaign for students applying to Sofia University. It is based on the Symfony2 platform and written in PHP language, allowing student to fill their exam application documents and pay taxes for them entirely online, without the need to travel to university building itself. In the first half of year 2014 thousands of students applied online for entrance exams and were able to view their exam marks online.

In the beginning of july exam sessions are over and the system goes in new stage - application documents to which I don't take part in.

projects.title: Personal project: Raytacing experiments for web browser
projects.description:
Performance and optimization test for experiments with raytracing in browser:

Premise 1: Modern browser capabilities including API making development of even triple-A titles potentially possible when running in the browser. Browsers can use the GPU for drawing, sound card for dynamic sound generation, and have extensive network capabilities. With the manifest API, a web browser can start the same as any desktop application, while maintain compatible code for I/O access.

Premise 2: Performant real-time raytracing is possible (using a proper indices), even on GPU not supporting raytracing pipelines.

Current: Using the capabilities of WebGL (compatible with OpenGL 3.0)
Future: Using the (currently upcoming) capabilities of WebGPU (inspired by Vulkan API) - current implementation incomplete due to rapid updates and chages in the underlying API.

profile_positions.description:
As a part of a R&D I was responsible for designing the architecture and implementing system integrating various micro-finance delivery channels, telecommunication companies and various and diverse front-ends (like USSD, Web, Smartphone mobile apps, ATM, etc.) into a single platform, ensuring the security and integrity of both financial information and financial transactions.
As a team lead I was responsible for organizing meetings, ensure team members had equal knowledge of the modules and requirements and taking decisions about both system implementation and development process.
